data.title: Dark Fairy Tales Games
data.meta_description: Games that look at the darker side of fairy tales. American McGee's Alice is an excellent example of one.
data.text:
The Wolf Among Us 2: A Telltale Series

2024

PC

XONE

+ 3 more

PS4

PS5

XSX

The second season of The Wolf Among Us, initially cancelled in September 2018 as a result of Telltale's massive layoffs. The game was later revived with a "re-announcement" during The Game Awards in December 2019.

Dragon Fin Soup

November 3, 2015

PS3N

PC

+ 2 more

PSNV

PS4

Dragon Fin Soup is an action RPG set in a twisted fairy tale world. It is the first game from Grimm Bros.

Vendetta: Curse of Raven's Cry

January 30, 2015

X360

PS3

+ 2 more

PC

PS4

An action-adventure game about a pirate who tries to avenge the murder of his family. Originally released under the title "Raven's Cry."

The Wolf Among Us

October 11, 2013

MAC

X360

+ 11 more

PS3

XBGS

PS3N

PC

IPHN

IPAD

ANDR

VITA

PSNV

XONE

PS4

A prequel to the Fables comic book series, The Wolf Among Us tells a tale of the reformed Big Bad Wolf of childhood folklore (who is the sheriff of a secluded community of fables in 20th century New York City) as he investigates a series of grisly murders.

Alice: Madness Returns

June 14, 2011

X360

PS3

+ 3 more

XBGS

PS3N

PC

Alice is back, and so is her fragile grasp on reality. She must journey through both Victorian London and the dark world of Wonderland to retain her sanity and find out the truth behind her family's deaths, in this long-awaited sequel to American McGee's Alice.

Legio

May 21, 2010

PC

A chess-like turn-based strategy game pitting the twins Rupert and Violetta of Bellalagusia against one another to see who is truly the rightful ruler of the kingdom.

The Path

March 18, 2009

MAC

PC

The Path is an adventure game inspired by the well known fairy tale, Little Red Riding Hood. The player is given to choice to control one of six sisters, each at different stages of their lives.

Little Red Riding Hood's Zombie BBQ

October 31, 2008

DS

DSI

Zombie BBQ is a scrolling shooter for the Nintendo DS in which you fight against zombie versions of fairy tale creatures. You can play as one of two characters, one being Little Red Riding Hood with a gun. Yes, people will do anything for money.

American McGee's Grimm

July 31, 2008

PC

A sinister storybook-like series that introduces the dwarf Grimm who is on a quest to return his classic stories to their original, macabre versions.

Conker's Bad Fur Day

March 4, 2001

N64

A comedy platform adventure featuring Conker, a drunkard, foul-mouthed red squirrel trying to find his way home after he awakes hungover in the middle of a field with a fuzzy memory and only the clothes on his back to accompany him.

The Longest Journey

April 20, 2000

PC

IPHN

IPAD

The Longest Journey puts the player in the shoes of 18-year old April Ryan as you face various challenges to find the Guardian and restore Balance between the two distinctly different worlds of Stark and Arcadia.
